article.Heading: Experts discuss top stocks post Budget 2017
article.Summary: Watch the interview of Ashwani Gujral, Sudarshan Sukhani, Mitessh Thakkar, SP Tulsian, and Prakash Diwan with Latha Venkatesh, Anuj Singhal, and Sonia Shenoy on CNBC-TV18, in which they shared their readings and outlook on market technicals, and fundamentals as well as specific stocks and sectors.
article.Body:
Watch the interview of Ashwani Gujral of ashwanigujral.com, Sudarshan Sukhani of s2analytics.com, Mitessh Thakkar of miteshthacker.com, SP Tulsian of sptulsian.com, and Prakash Diwan Market Expert at Altamount Capital Management with Latha Venkatesh, Anuj Singhal, and Sonia Shenoy on CNBC-TV18, in which they shared their readings and outlook on market technicals, and fundamentals as well as specific stocks and sectors.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos.
